titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Moore family cemetery plot records 1988.049
titlestmt.author: Matthew Gorham
titlestmt.sponsor: This collection was processed and described as part of the project, "Uncovering the Secrets of Brooklyn's 19th Century Past: Creation to Consolidation," funded by the Council on Library and Information Resources, with additional support from The Gladys Krieble Delmas Foundation.

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2023-08-21 11:09:52 +0000.

origination.label: creator
origination.corpname: Cypress Hills Cemetery (Brooklyn, New York, N.Y.)

did.abstract: This collection contains a Cypress Hills Cemetery Deed from 1854 for members of the Moore family, as well as accompanying documents relating to the plot, such as rules and regulations and receipts of donations to the Perpetual Care Fund.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Identification of item, date (if known); Moore family cemetery plot records, 1988.049, Box and Folder number; Brooklyn Historical Society.
